price: He said, “Have you come to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?
arabic: قَالَ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتُخۡرِجَنَا مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَا بِسِحۡرِكَ يَٰمُوسَىٰ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
